about_the_game:
Embark on a hilarious journey where every step is a potential catastrophe. You're a lovable, yet Ridiculously Injury Prone character who, against all odds, must complete a series of mundane tasks for your mother. Whether you're taking a cake to grandma's house, helping Uncle Bob with the groceries, or personally delivering holiday cards, chaos is lurking around every corner.

The clock is ticking, and the pressure is on to deliver the goods without succumbing to a cascade of slapstick calamities. Timing, reflexes, and a touch of luck are your best friends as you strive to remain accident-free and complete each task unscathed. Just when you think you're in the clear, a new absurd challenge pops up, ready to send you flying into a world of comedic misfortune. RIP.

RIP: Ridiculously Injury Prone is currently in development.
Follow for updates!

name: RIP: Ridiculously Injury Prone
short_description: In RIP: Ridiculously Injury Prone - Embark on a slapstick-filled adventure where mishaps are the norm. Keep your wits about you, dodge calamity, and quickly complete tasks without getting injured!
